metadata.name: Andre Vandenburg x Knicks: Knicks_Verse
metadata.description:
Knicks_Verse was inspired by Andre Vandenburg's love of basketball, games, music, culture, and the energy of NYC.
The piece is a representation of NYC flooded by a light show on game night. The light show is an abstract representation of a basketball game and all its excitement. From the lights to the music, all are carefully crafted to capture the celebration happening inside MSG.
